name: screenshare-v2
description: Modern Screen Share & Remote Desktop Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install:signaling && npm run install:client
scripts.dev:agent: cd apps/agent && npm run tauri dev
scripts.build: npm run build:signaling && npm run build:client && npm run build:agent
scripts.build:agent: cd apps/agent && npm run tauri build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:signaling && npm run lint:client
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: echo 'Starting MongoDB on localhost:27017...' && echo 'Create database: screenshare'
scripts.start:client: cd apps/client && npm run build && npx serve -s build -p 3000
